customOrder.title: Custom Order
customOrder.text: If you have not found a suitable item in the price list, you can always write to me and we will discuss the type of work and the price individually!

tos.title: Terms of service
tos.pretitle: By ordering any art from me you accept that you have read my Terms of Service and agree with them.

general.title: General
general.text:
Please write in a clear and nice manner.
Provide neat visual references.
I have the right to decline your commission for any personal reason.

payment.title: Payment
payment.text: All commissions must be fully prepaid. At the moment I accept payment only via my Boosty due to the inability to use other payment methods in Russia.
payment.specialText: You could find the payment guide by following the Boosty link above.

process.title: Process
process.deadline: The deadlines are discussed individually for each artwork based on the wishes of the customer, their place in the queue and my current busyness.
process.dont: I don't draw any art and don't respond to work related messages on weekends and holidays.
process.worktime: I mostly draw on weekdays in the evening (GMT+3).
process.wip: WIP (work in progress) is provided at the art stages such as sketch, lineart, color and final.
process.queue: Order queue can be found on my Trello.

themes.title: themes
themes.allowed:
I do mostly SFW content and as an exception soft NSFW (such as bones, blood or artistic nudity)
Any kind of animals, anthro, furry, monsters and other creatures are allowed.
themes.notAllowed: I don't draw excessive NSFW (such as pornographic content, fetishes, hardcore violence, etc.), humans or characters with human-like faces, architecture, mecha, vehicles and fan-art (however custom fan-characters are okay).

satisfaction.title: Customer satisfaction
satisfaction.first: I will do everything I can to make my customers happy. If I make a mistake in the character or background, I will correct it at any stage of the work for free.
satisfaction.second: Any amount of free edits also allowed at the sketch stage (compositional, anatomical, etc.)
satisfaction.third: If later corrections are related to the unclear references or you want to change something that has already been started/done and is not related to my mistake, then an additional fee will be required for edits.
satisfaction.fourth: Make sure to be clear in your order what you aim for.

copyright.title: Copyright/usage policy
copyright.prelist:
I, as the artist, hold every right to the produced drawing.
I'm allowed to use the copyrighted artwork to:
copyright.firstList:
• Promote myself in any place or site
• Publish books and artbooks
• Post or display it wherever I want
copyright.secondList:
• Use the copyrighted artwork for personal (non-commercial) use only unless agreed otherwise in written form
• Print, save and share the art, use it to promote themselves (with credit of my name or links presented)
• Claim the right of their character(s) but not the drawing itself
copyright.afterListTwo: If you break the copyright infringement in any way, every right you had to the drawing will be retracted.
copyright.preListThree: The following is considered copyright infringement:
copyright.thirdList:
• Reproducing/using the copyrighted artwork commercially (meaning making money of it in any way) without my written approval
• Using artwork in any kind of NFT project
• Taking credit for the creation of the artwork
• Removing any watermarks/signatures
• Altering the artwork without my consent
copyright.preListFour: A purchase of commercial rights to the artwork will be 300% of original price. With commercial rights you are allowed to:
copyright.fourthList:
• Make any sort of merch with the artwork
• Use it in books, covers, as props, change it in any way and promote your own brand
• Credit is still required for usage of the artwork, even if altered or edited

refund.title: Canceling/refunding policy
refund.text:
I have the right to cancel and refund the money for your commission.
You can not cancel a commission after work has been started (otherwise you have the right to cancel it and request a refund from me).
If you file an uncoordinated chargeback against me, your right to everything I have ever made for you will be retracted and I have the right to sell the copyrighted artwork to other buyers.
Your name will be publicly posted everywhere I want for others to watch out for.
We can discuss any of the information provided according to your individual wishes in your order.
